plan(1,init, sentence(true,move(print,"avatar STARTS"),'','' ))
plan(2,init, sentence(true,not here ActionMove,'','' ))
plan(3,init, sentence(-  goalResult( R) ,move(print,goalResult( R)),'','' ))
plan(4,init, sentence(true,move(print,"START START START START"),'','' ))
plan(5,init, sentence(true,move(robotForward,100,0),'','' ))
plan(6,init, sentence(true,move(robotBackward,100,0),'','' ))
plan(7,init, sentence(true,move(robotLeft,100,0),'','' ))
plan(8,init, sentence(true,move(robotRight,100,0),'','' ))
plan(9,init, sentence(true,move(print,"ENDS"),'','' ))
